One day, when your mother gets older and older, will you dislike her more words and her had health? Here is a mother`s letter to her _ . Let`s read it and see what`s moving you.
Dear son,
When I grow old one day, please be  _  to me and try to understand me. If I get dirty when eating or if I can`t  dress  myself., help me. Remember the hours I spent teaching you . If I say some things again and again when I speak to you, please  listen to me. When you were _ , I had to read you the same story again and again  _  you went to sleep. When my tired legs do not let me walk, give me your  _ . I did the same when you started walking. When I come near to you, you should be next to me, try to understand me and help me  _  I did when you were a baby. When I am ill, you should look  _ me well, just like I took good care of you day and night. Please spend more time  staying  with me when you are free. I`ll pay you by a smile and love.
I love you, son!
Your mother,
Mary
